translations: 1. 死亡率：在一定时间内死亡人数与总人口的比例。
2. 死亡人数：在一定时间内死亡的人数。
· The number of mortalities due to the epidemic has been rising.
由于这次疫情，死亡人数一直在上升。

phrs.translation: 婴儿死亡率，早期失效；早期故障期
产妇死亡率，母性死亡率；母死率
新生儿死亡率，初生仔畜死亡率

sentences.sentence: There were significant differences among the mortalities of the cotton bollworm under different humidities.
sentences.translation: 相对湿度发生变化时，感病棉铃虫死亡速度和死亡率明显不同。

sentences.sentence: In experimental populations, mortalities of the 5th instar larvae and pupae were higher than those of instars at initial stages.
sentences.translation: 实验种群中初期死亡率较低，5龄幼虫和蛹的死亡率较高。

sentences.sentence: The mortalities of pregnant and lying-in women and infants have decreased to 39.19% and 43.70% separately in 1998 compared in 1990.
sentences.translation: 结果农村新法接生健康教育有显著成效，1998年底孕产妇死亡率、婴儿死亡率较1990年分别下降39 19%和43 70 %。
